name: ormGetSession
description: Get the current ORM session object

params.name: datasource
params.description: Name of the data source used for the session. If not defined, the default datasource defined in Application.cfc/cfapplication is used.

examples.title: Gets the Hibernate session object associated with the datasource from the application.
examples.description: Returns the object representing the current Hibernate session so you can perform functions on it.
